scripts.say: No signs of the enemy. Cancelling high alert status. Ascending to periscope depth and entering snorkel navigation mode.
Guess it's just like the intel said. The wind doesn't blow out here.
Feels like the pressure's way higher than on the outside too... This doesn't feel right...
Let's just get finish the mission and head back...
Hold up. A target is approaching. Judging by the identification signal, they're... allied?
There's no way we'd have allied vessels out here... Maybe your sonar's broken?
...Wait, no. I'm receiving their signal too...
Submerge and prepare for trouble. Remember what the commander said about not trusting anything out on the Mirror Sea.
True... We should just stay underwater and gather intel...
